member.name: D2D1_INK_STYLE_PROPERTIES

member.name: D2D1_INK_STYLE_PROPERTIES.nibShape

member.name: D2D1_INK_STYLE_PROPERTIES.nibTransform
member.summary: The transform applied to the nib. Note that the translation components of the transform matrix are ignored for the purposes of rendering.
